text: Isis Naija Gaston (born January 1, 2000), also known as Ice Spice, is an American rapper from the Bronx. ==Personal life== Ice Spice is bisexual. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2000 births Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Living people Category:Musicians from the Bronx Category:Bisexual people Category:21st- century American rappers Category:African-American rappers Category:LGBT singers Category:LGBT songwriters
title: Ice Spice
